name: white-apricorn
effect: May be given to Kurt in azalea town to produce a fast ball.
short_effect: Used to make a Fast Ball.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A white Apricorn. It doesn’t smell like anything.
